fullText: While the musical doesn't quite capture the lightning-in-a-bottle magic of the beloved film trilogy, it offers enough nostalgic thrills and impressive technical wizardry to satisfy fans and newcomers alike.
dtliExcerpt: While the musical doesn't quite capture the lightning-in-a-bottle magic of the beloved film trilogy, it offers enough nostalgic thrills and impressive technical wizardry to satisfy fans and newcomers alike.
